original_text: Bring all the men, women and children together. Also bring the foreign people who live in your towns. They must all hear God's Law as it is read to them. Then they can learn to respect and obey the Lord your God. They will be careful to obey all the teaching of his Law.
korean_text: 곧 백성의 남녀와 어린이와 네 성읍 안에 거류하는 타국인을 모으고 그들에게 듣고 배우고 네 하나님 여호와를 경외하며 이 율법의 모든 말씀을 지켜 행하게 하고

sentences.original_text: Bring all the men, women and children together
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 남자, 여자, 아이들을 함께 모으세요

sentences.original_text: They must all hear God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 하나님의 법을 들어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as it is read to them
Then they can learn to respect and obey
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들은 존중하고 순종하는 법을 배울 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They will be careful to obey
all the teaching of his Law
